item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“ta1nt3d, post:8, topic:533585”]or you could just do something like this [code]public static void spawnZombies(int wave) {
switch(wave) {

		case 1:
			createNPC(73, 2779, 10092);
			createNPC(73, 2773, 10094);
			createNPC(73, 2771, 10090);
			createNPC(73, 2776, 10088);
			createNPC(73, 2783, 10087);
			createNPC(73, 2786, 10075);
			createNPC(73, 2788, 10069);
			createNPC(73, 2785, 10061);
			createNPC(73, 2780, 10064);
			createNPC(73, 2777, 10071);
			createBoss(8133,2780, 10073);
			break;[/code]

it doesent really matter the way i handled it because if you want to load two different npc’s theres only a few ways you can do it, and thats one of them[/quote]

You’re welcome.

private int[] waveSizes = {1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 17...}
private int currentWave;

private void sendWave() {
    for (int i = 0; i < waveSizes[currentWave]; i ++)
        createNPC(73, x, y);
    if (getBossForWave() != -1)
        createNPC(getBossForWave(), x, y)
}

private int getBossForWave() {
    if (currentWave == 3)
        return 6006;
    else if (currentWave == 9)
        return 6010;
    return -1;
}

Read full topic

item.title: My Zombies minigame release
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

Today i am releasing my old zombies minigame as i have written a much better one, i hope you enjoy it

what you are adding:

ASSUMED KNOWLEDGE: copy & paste

first off create a new class and name it Zombies.java and place it in server.model.minigames

then paste the below code into it:

[CODE]package server.model.minigames;

import server.Config;
import server.model.npcs.NPC;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.Player;
import server.Server;
import server.util.Misc;

/**
*

  • @author Incarnated

*/

@SuppressWarnings({ “unused” })
public class Zombies {

Client p;

public Zombies(Client c) {
	this.p = c;
}

/*
 * Finds Zombies
 */
public int FindZombie() {
	for (int i = 0; i < p.Zombiez.length; i++) {
		if (p.Zombiez[i] == null) {
			return i;
		}
	}
	return -1;
}

public void KillAllZombies() {
	for (int i = 0; i < p.Zombiez.length; i++) {
		if (p.Zombiez[i] != null) {
			p.Zombiez[i].isDead = true;
			p.Zombiez[i] = null;
		}
	}
}

/*
 * Removes from array
 */
public void HandleZombieDeath(NPC n) {
	for (int i = 0; i < p.Zombiez.length; i++) {
		if (p.Zombiez[i] != null) {
			if (p.Zombiez[i] == n) {
				p.Zombiez[i] = null;

				if (GetZombieCount() <= 0) {
					p.Zombiewave += 1;
					spawnWave(p.Zombiewave);
				}

			}
		}
	}
}

/**
 * 
 * lol
 */
public static int POINTS = 0;

/**
 * The wave the game is on.
 */
public static int WAVE = 0;

/**
 * How many zombies killed.
 */
public static int ZOMBIES = 0;

/**
 * Is the game started or not.
 */
public static boolean STARTED;
/**
 * How many waves are left.
 */
public static int WAVESLEFT = 18;

public static void interfaceSend(Client c) {
	if (STARTED = true) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 21120);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Points: @red@" + POINTS, 21121);
		// c.getPA().sendFrame126("" , 21122);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Wave: @red@" + Integer.toString(WAVE),
				21122);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126(
				"@gre@Waves Left: @red@" + Integer.toString(WAVESLEFT),
				21123);
		c.getPA().walkableInterface(21119);
	} else if (!STARTED) {
		resetInterface();
	} else
		return;
}

public static boolean playerInGame(Client p) {
	return p.absX > 3239 && p.absX < 9352 && p.absY > 3557 && p.absY < 9376;
	}

public static void resetInterface() {
	WAVESLEFT = 18;
	WAVE = 0;
	ZOMBIES = 0;
	STARTED = false;
	POINTS = 0;

}

private int GetZombieCount() {
	int count = 0;
	for (int i = 0; i < p.Zombiez.length; i++) {
		if (p.Zombiez[i] != null) {
			count += 1;
			// ZOMBIES += 1;
			POINTS += 10 + Misc.random(5000);//lol random shizz to make it look cooler
		}
	}
	// p.sendMessage("Zombies left:"+count);
	return count;

}

public static int[][] Waves = {
		{ 73 },
		{ 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73 },
		{ 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73,
				73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73, 73 },

};

// public final int X_SPAWN = 2860;
// public final int Y_SPAWN = 3725;

public final int X_SPAWN = 3248;
public final int Y_SPAWN = 9364;

private void spawnWave(int wave) {
	this.KillAllZombies();
	WAVE += 1;
	WAVESLEFT -= 1;
	if (wave >= Waves.length) {
		exitGame(true, p);
		return;
	}

	for (int i = 0; i < Waves[wave].length; i++) {
		int npcId = Waves[wave][i];
		int modifier = Misc.random(wave);
		if (modifier == 0) {
			modifier = 1;
		}
		if (npcId > 1) {
			Server.npcHandler.SpawnZombieNPC(p, npcId,
					X_SPAWN + Misc.random(7), Y_SPAWN + Misc.random(8),
					p.heightLevel, 1, 80, 5, 50, 5, true, false);
		}
	}
	int wavesLeft = Waves.length - wave;
	// p.sendMessage("Wave: @gre@"+wave+" @bla@Waves left: @gre@"+wavesLeft+"");

}

private int[] RARES = { 6583, 4083, 4063, 4025, 4026, 4030, 4030 };

private int[] SUPERRARES = { 21547, 21557, 21549, 21559, 21539, 21543,
		21553, 21563, 21545, 21555, 21565, 21551, 21561, 21541 };

public void exitGame(boolean won, Client c) {
	this.KillAllZombies();
	resetInterface();
	c.getPA().closeAllWindows();
	if (p == null) {
		return;
	}
	p.teleportToX = Config.EDGEVILLE_X;
	p.teleportToY = Config.EDGEVILLE_Y;
	p.heightLevel = 0;
	int PKpointreward = 15 + Misc.random(25);
	int wonRare = Misc.random(15);
	int wonArm = Misc.random(50);
	if (won && wonRare != 0 && wonRare != 1) {
		p.sendMessage("You have been awared " + PKpointreward + " pk points.");
		p.sendMessage("Keep playing for a chance to win rares 1 in 15 chance");
	} else if (won && wonRare == 0) {
		p.PkPoints += PKpointreward;
		p.getItems().addItem(RARES[Misc.random(RARES.length - 1)], 1, "");
		p.sendMessage("You have been awared " + PKpointreward
				+ " pk points. You won a rare");
	} else if (!won) {
		resetInterface();
		p.sendMessage("@red@You have lost, you get no reward!");
		KillAllZombies();
	} else if (won && wonRare == 1) {
		p.getItems().addItem(this.p.getPA().randomBarrows(), 1, "");
		p.sendMessage("You have been awared " + PKpointreward
				+ " pk points. You won some Barrow's");
	}

	if (won && wonArm == 0) {
		int rare = SUPERRARES[Misc.random(SUPERRARES.length - 1)];
		p.sendMessage("You won a rare!");
		Server.yellToAll("[@mag@MINIGAME@bla@]: @gre@" + p.playerName
				+ " @bla@won a @gre@" + p.getItems().getItemName(rare)
				+ " @bla@from the Zombies minigame");
		p.getItems().addItem(rare, 1, "Zombies Minigame brid arm reward");
	} else if (won && wonArm != 0) {
		p.sendMessage("You needed Rare Random to be 0 to win a brid arm your's was @gre@"
				+ wonArm + "");
		p.sendMessage("It is random you can still win Npc transformation items and barrows!");
	}

	KillAllZombies();
	p.Zombiewave = 0;
	resetInterface();
}

public void startGame() {
	p.Zombiewave = 0;
	p.teleportToX = X_SPAWN;
	p.teleportToY = Y_SPAWN;
	p.heightLevel = (p.playerId * 4) + 4;
	spawnWave(0);
	p.getCombat().resetPrayers();
	STARTED = true;
}

}
[/CODE]

next open up NPCHandler.java and paste the following method anywhere into it:

[CODE] public void SpawnZombieNPC(Client c, int npcType, int x, int y, int heightLevel, int WalkingType, int HP, int maxHit, int attack, int defence, boolean attackPlayer, boolean headIcon) {
int slot = -1;

  for(int newNPC = 1; newNPC < maxNPCs; ++newNPC) {
     if(npcs[newNPC] == null) {
        slot = newNPC;
        break;
     }
  }

  if(slot != -1) {
     NPC var15 = this.getNpcType(slot, npcType);
     if(c.dungeoneering) {
        var15.dungedFor = c;
     }

     var15.absX = x;
     var15.absY = y;
     var15.makeX = x;
     var15.makeY = y;
     var15.heightLevel = c.heightLevel;
     var15.walkingType = this.getWalkingType(npcType);
     var15.HP = HP;
     var15.MaxHP = HP;
     var15.spawnedBy = c.getId();
     var15.respawns = false;
     var15.forceChat("Braaaaaaaiinzzz!!!!!");
     
     c.Zombiez[c.getZombieGame().FindZombie()] = var15;

     npcs[slot] = var15;
     npcs[slot].attacking = c;
  }

}[/CODE]

Still in NPCHandler search for: public void process() {

and in that method place this:[CODE] if((Client)PlayerHandler.players[npcs[i].killedBy] != null) {
Client c = (Client)PlayerHandler.players[npcs[i].killedBy];

                 if(c.inZombieGame()) {
                         c.ZombieGame.HandleZombieDeath(npcs[i]);
    
                 }
                 
             }[/CODE]

near all of your other npcdeath handlers

next open up client.java and add the import import server.model.minigames.Zombies;

then still in client.java add this in anywhere: [CODE] public Zombies ZombieGame = new Zombies(this);

public Zombies getZombieGame() {
    return ZombieGame;
}[/CODE]

then still in client.java search for: public void destruct() {

and in that method add : if (this.inZombieGame()) { this.ZombieGame.exitGame(false, this); }

then still in client.java search for : public void logout() {

and in that method add : if (this.inZombieGame()) { this.ZombieGame.exitGame(false, this); }

then still in client.java search for: public void processRightClick() {
and in that method add: else if (Zombies.playerInGame(this) && Zombies.STARTED == true) { Zombies.interfaceSend(this); this.getPA().showOption(3, 0, "null", 1); this.getPA().showOption(2, 0, "null", 1); }

then open up Player.java and add this somewhere: [CODE] public boolean inZombieGame() {

  if(heightLevel == ((playerId*4) + 4)) {
      return true;
  } else {
      return false;
  }

}[/CODE]
then still in player.java search for: public boolean inMulti() {
and in that method add : this.inZombieGame() ||

still in player.java add these at the top : public int Zombiewave = 0; public NPC[] Zombiez = new NPC[500];

then open playerassistant.java and add your import : import server.model.minigames.Zombies;

then search for : public boolean safeAreas() { and somewhere in that add : && !c.inZombieGame()
then search for : public void giveLife() { (or whatever your givelife method is named) and add in && !c.inZombieCaves())
under : if (this.c.duelStatus <= 4 && safeAreas()) { (as far as this part goes everyones death method is different so you would add !c.inZombieCaves() above wherever your resetKeepItems(); is )

also in the same method add this in : } else if (c.inZombieGame()) { c.ZombieGame.exitGame(false, c); (mines near (this.c.pitsStatus == 1) { , again everyones is different)

then search for : public boolean spellTeleport(int x, int y, int height) {
and add in if (c.inZombieGame()) { c.ZombieGame.exitGame(false, c); }

then search for : public boolean startTeleport(int x, int y, int height, String teleportType) {
and add in if (c.inZombieGame()) { c.ZombieGame.exitGame(false, c); }

and here is a simple command to place the player in the game and start it, this can be added to a teleport ect.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("zombies")) { if(c.heightLevel == 0) { c.ZombieGame.startGame(); } }

if you use this feedback would be appreciated

Read full topic
